sent.orig: I criticized him, not because I hate him but because I love him.
sent.trans: 我批评他不是因为我恨他而是因为我爱他。

sent.orig: Neither riches nor honours can corrupt him; neither poverty nor humbleness can make him swerve from principle; and neither threats nor forces can subdue him.
sent.trans: 富贵不能淫， 贫贱不能移，威武不能屈。

sent.orig: A gang of youths set on him outside a pub and roughed him up.
sent.trans: 一伙青年在一家小酒店外面袭击了他，将他揍了一顿。

sent.orig: A warmhearted man acted as a go-between for him and introduced him to a girl.
sent.trans: 一个热心人牵线搭桥给他介绍了一位姑娘。

sent.orig: All the members of the team gathered around him, patting him on the back.
sent.trans: 全体队员都聚在他周围夸奖他。
